- Outdoor condenser unit (Ameristar Heating & Cooling) mounted on a raised metal frame next to stucco wall.  
- Debris and palm fronds resting on and surrounding the unit; vegetation in contact with cabinet.  
- Limited service clearance on sides; ensure minimum 24 in clearance for airflow and service access.  
- Base area has leaves/soil buildup; recommend cleaning around unit to improve airflow and reduce corrosion risk.  
- Wall-mounted electrical disconnect visible; verify weatherproof enclosure and clear access.  
- No visible mechanical damage; fins appear dustyâ€”schedule routine condenser cleaning and inspection.
